data.text:
Wukari

Wukari is a city in Taraba, in Nigeria.

GPS Coordinates of Wukari, Taraba, Nigeria

Wukari is located on the latitude of 7.87139 and longitude of 9.77786 and has a geohash of s1quy8bn0tky.

Cities and Towns near Wukari

The nearest significant population center from Wukari is Riti in Taraba, Nigeria, located 18 kilometers or 11 miles ← W of the city. Other locations in close proximity include Ibi (Taraba, Nigeria) located 34 km (21 mi) ↖ NW and Zaki Biam (Benue, Nigeria) located 44 km (27 mi) ↓ S of Wukari.

In total, we found 8 cities near Wukari in our database.
